page.title: 04District Nurse in Caversham
page.content: My mum does dressings for leg ulcers and post operative wounds, which are surgical wounds when you have just had an operation (usually young people). She helps the elderly to keep clean, advises on family planning, does{electro_cardiographs (ECG), helps to rehabiliatate people i.e. to walk, talk and feed themselves after operations. She gives {immunizations}against polio, tetanus, diphtheria and whooping cough. She also helps people with emotional and physical needs. She helps with the{counselling}of the very sick and their families for cancer and multiple sclerosis. There is also urine and blood taken which is checked for diabetes and kidney failure. For the incontinent (young or old) my mum provides any necessary aids i.e. inco pads, catheters.
